title: Lizzie Armanto / Emma Coburn / Sky Brown
description:
Lizzie Armanto represents Finland in skateboarding. She is one of the best ever and the only female skater to conquer Tony Hawk's infamous 360 loop. She speaks highly of fellow competitor Sky Brown (who we also hear from in the podcast!) Plus, Emma Coburn of the USA is in the 3,000m steeplechase final. She talks about what can be learnt from athletics in terms of gender parity.

Full Lizzie episode: https://olympics.com/en/podcast/podcast-lizzie-armanto-tony-hawk-skateboarding

Full Emma episode: https://olympics.com/en/podcast/podcast-emma-coburn

Full Sky Brown episode: https://olympics.com/en/podcast/podcast-sky-brown-great-britain-gb-skateboarder
